data.actual_result: its moving and continues to move after a new song automatically plays
data.expected_result: the green bar shouldnt be moving at all cause no songs in the playlist are playing
data.short_description: green progress bar on spotify embeds is still moving when song in playlist isnt choosen
data.steps_to_repro: - have the spotify app installed - paste a spotify playlist in chat - choose a song to play on the app from the playlist - on the app choose a different song to play (not on/from the playlist)  -  go back to the embed and hover over the title of the embed
